text:
e="preserve">Miguel Ángel Castellini (January 26, 1947 – October 28, 2020) was an Argentine professional boxer. Castellini, who was active as a professional from 1965 to 1980, was known for having held the Lineal and WBA Light Middleweight titles. He was born in Santa Rosa, La Pampa, Argentina.
Castellini died on October 28, 2020 in Buenos Aires from COVID-19, aged 73.
